text: Ne mukhole Hajj nende Umra (oluchendo lwokhutsia Makkah) shichila Nyasaye, ne nimwikalilwa murusie eshihanwa shamunyala shimwanguyila ne mulabeka emirwe chienyu tawe okhula eshihanwa shiule habandu ashikhoyele okhuba. Kho ulia uli omulwale mwinywe nohomba uwumiye khumurwe kukwe, naye arunje khulwokhufunga nohomba okhurusia ishihanwa nohomba eshisinzwa, ne nimulaba obulayi, kho yesiyesi wisangasia khulwokhukhola umra- kho ahije â€“ awo asinze ishisinzwa shimwanguyila okhunyoola. Ne ubula okhunyoola afunge tsinyanga tsitaru, nali muhijja nende tsinyanga saba nimwakhakalukha, etso ni tsinyanga ekhumi tsinaamba. Ako ni khulwa ulia owabandu baye shibali ahambi nende omusikiti kwoluyali tawe. Ne murie Nyasaye ne mumanye mbu Nyasaye ni omululu wokhuhana eshinyasio
